Submerged Notes

“Submerged Notes” is a dreamy lo-fi ambient piece built on muted reverse piano notes, soft tape hiss, and swirling analog synths. The textures drift like waves, creating a reflective, emotional atmosphere. Each layer dissolves gently into the next, evoking nostalgia and warmth — as if submerged in memory itself. A track designed for quiet focus, reflective nights, and moments when sound feels like water.

  • Album: Stranger Vibes
  • Genre: lo-fi
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 2:09
